system.description: At the end of the user's activations, they will alternate between Full Belly Mode Forme and Hangry Mode Forme. While in Full Belly Mode, consuming an equipped [Food] Item will give +1 DEF and SPDEF stages for 3 activations. While in Hangry Mode, consuming an equipped [Food] Item will give +1 ATK and SPATK stages for 3 activations.
